text: Kya yeh log zameen mein kabhi chaley phirey nahin hain ke inhein un logon ka anjaam nazar aata jo insey pehle guzar chuke hain, aur insey bahut zyada taaqatwar thay? Allah ko koi cheez aajiz (frustrate) karne wali nahin hai, na aasmaano mein aur na zameen mein. Woh sab kuch jaanta hai aur har cheez par qudrat rakhta hai
